summary: A look at the personal and private life of the late Apple CEO, Steve Jobs.
cast: Steve Jobs|Alex Gibney|Steve Wozniak|Michael S. Malone|Nolan Bushnell|Regis McKenna|Michael Moritz|Sherry Turkle|Bob Belleville|Chris Espinosa|Michael Murray|Rony Sebok|Bud Tribble|Daniel Kottke|Kobun Chino Otogawa|Chrisann Brennan|Michael Hawley|Joe Nocera|Jon Rubinstein|Avie Tevanian|Andy Grignon|Yukari Iwatani Kane|Andy Serwer|Peter Elkind|Jesus Diaz|Jason Chen|Nick Denton|Brian Lam|Chris Feasel|Anoosh Tertzakian|Ridley Scott|Tomasz Wyka|Tom Brokaw|Tim Cook|Katie Couric|Al Gore|Ted Koppel|Carl Levin|Claire McCaskill|Andrew Napolitano|Charles Payne|Dan Rather|Diane Sawyer|Jon Stewart|Stuart Varney|Ali Velshi|Brian Williams
title: Steve Jobs: The Man in the Machine
